title: How to make music using GarageBand - Quora

response.answer_text: Q: How do you make a basic track in Garageband? A: The best way to do it is to read the User Guides. Apple has an excellent support website that is the only authoritative site for these kind of questions. You can certainly create music with a MacBook Air, just read the guides and practice. Apple: GarageBand - Official Apple Support (GarageBand - Official Apple Support) https://help.apple.com/garageband/mac/ (https://help.apple.com/garageband/mac/) GarageBand User Guide for iPad (GarageBand User Guide for iPad) GarageBand User Guide for iPhone (GarageBand User Guide for iPhone)

Just start! You can either start with the groove (beat) of the track or the rhythm (chord structure). Once you've finished the music, you'll be needing the help of an audio engineer who will mix the track, and then finally master it to make it upload-ready. Note that mixing is something that cannot be learnt overnight. It requires experience, knowledge and good ears. Hence it's advised that once your music is complete, always hire a mix engineer for the finalisation of the track since he/she would know the technical glitches and the capability to fix them. Hope it helped you!
